channel.title: So they finally released the master capes
channel.description:
They're exactly what I thought they would be. They would look like the dungeoneering skillcape, but with the appropriate logo/colors. [img]https://scontent-a-dfw.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ash3/t1.0-9/10178032_10152703262251729_2820260062521295180_n.png[/img] (taken from their facebook)
Also, looks like The Wanderer was pretty damn close on the ones he made: [img]http://img205.imageshack.us/img205/1207/mastercapes.jpg[/img] (taken from his thread)

item.title: So they finally released the master capes
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

I’m going for 120 magic.

Anyway, here’s an image of all of them in-game.

I also read that Jagex is going to make the particles look brighter with bloom on.

Read full topic
item.source: So they finally released the master capes

item.title: So they finally released the master capes
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Michael P:

They’re the same, just a few minor changes… Wow…

Between wanderers and rs’s, his have the old skill logo’s, and the colors are a bit different.

Also: All 120 capes have the particle effect like the 120 dungeon cape. The color of the particles is the same color as the skill (So HP = red, etc)

Read full topic

item.title: So they finally released the master capes
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“naseem142, post:2, topic:542623”]pffft… the remakes i made look better

[spoiler]




[/spoiler]

[size=1pt]not really.[/size][/quote]
Yours look clean, there’s look HD. lol.
Not saying it’s bad in anyway.

Edit: They really could have used a better gradient on the capes, you can see where the colors change xD
